FlexceeTrchAcademy

 

[/et_pb_text][et_pb_text _builder_version=”4.17.2″ _module_preset=”default” text_font=”GB||||||||” text_text_color=”#FFFFFF” text_font_size=”29px” text_orientation=”center” custom_margin=”-200px|-400px|||false|false” custom_margin_tablet=”-200px|-270px|||false|false” custom_margin_phone=”-150px|-250px|||false|false” custom_margin_last_edited=”on|phone” global_colors_info=”{}”]

FrontEnd-development

[/et_pb_text][/et_pb_column][/et_pb_row][/et_pb_section][et_pb_section fb_built=”1″ fullwidth=”on” _builder_version=”4.17.3″ _module_preset=”default” background_color=”#093A51″ global_colors_info=”{}”][et_pb_fullwidth_header title=”FlexceeTrchAcademy” header_image_url=”https://nextgen.seamfix.com/wp-content/uploads/2022/05/mixed-programers-team-working-group-project-multiple-screens-showing-running-code-it-startup-office-coder-pointing-pencil-computer-screen-with-software-compiling-code-scaled.jpg” _builder_version=”4.17.3″ _module_preset=”default” title_font=”GB||||||||” title_text_align=”right” title_font_size=”35px” content_font=”Avenir||||||||” content_text_align=”right” content_font_size=”30px” background_color=”#093A51″ title_text_align_tablet=”” title_text_align_phone=”center” title_text_align_last_edited=”on|phone” content_text_align_tablet=”” content_text_align_phone=”center” content_text_align_last_edited=”on|phone” content_font_size_tablet=”” content_font_size_phone=”20px” content_font_size_last_edited=”on|phone” box_shadow_style_image=”preset4″ box_shadow_color_image=”#06D665″ global_colors_info=”{}”]

FRONTEND DEVELOPMENT

[/et_pb_fullwidth_header][/et_pb_section][et_pb_section fb_built=”1″ _builder_version=”4.17.3″ _module_preset=”default” global_colors_info=”{}”][et_pb_row _builder_version=”4.17.3″ _module_preset=”default” global_colors_info=”{}”][et_pb_column type=”4_4″ _builder_version=”4.17.3″ _module_preset=”default” global_colors_info=”{}”][et_pb_text _builder_version=”4.17.3″ _module_preset=”default” text_font=”Avenir||||||||” text_text_color=”#2a2a2a” text_font_size=”20px” text_orientation=”center” global_colors_info=”{}”]

An intensive 6-month online frontend development course for a career in Web Design and Web Development.

FrontEnd Web Development (or Client-side development) is the development of the user interface of a website so that users can view and interact with the site.

Frontend Developers need to be skilled in languages like HTML, CSS and JavaScript. They also have to be able to use frameworks like Bootstrap, ReactJS, and AngularJS.

Without Frontend developers the users will have nothing to interact with or use.

[/et_pb_text][/et_pb_column][/et_pb_row][/et_pb_section][et_pb_section fb_built=”1″ _builder_version=”4.17.0″ _module_preset=”default” global_colors_info=”{}”][et_pb_row _builder_version=”4.17.0″ _module_preset=”default” global_colors_info=”{}”][et_pb_column type=”4_4″ _builder_version=”4.17.0″ _module_preset=”default” global_colors_info=”{}”][et_pb_tabs active_tab_background_color=”#06D665″ inactive_tab_background_color=”#093A51″ _builder_version=”4.18.0″ _module_preset=”default” tab_text_color=”#FFFFFF” body_font=”Avenir||||||||” body_font_size=”20px” tab_font=”Avenir||||||||” tab_font_size=”20px” border_radii=”on|10px|10px|10px|10px” global_colors_info=”{}”][et_pb_tab title=”Curriculum ” _builder_version=”4.17.0″ _module_preset=”default” global_colors_info=”{}”]

There are no pre-requisites for this program. You will learn about frontend development, apply the lessons and make them real. Some of the things you will learn include:

  • Introduction to Computers and the Internet
  • Web Foundations: HTML and CSS 
  • Introduction to Programming
  • Introduction to GitHub
  • Pseudocode
  • Functions, Classes and Data Structures
  • Object Oriented Programming
  • Modules and Asynchronous Programming
  • Javascript and the Browser: Classes and Object Prototypes
  • Web Application Development
  • Deployment & The Cloud CI/CD
  • Advanced Web Development
  • JavaScript Design Patterns and Writing Tests

[/et_pb_tab][et_pb_tab title=”Class Schedule” _builder_version=”4.17.0″ _module_preset=”default” global_colors_info=”{}”]

Everyday, you will spend hours outside of mandatory live class studying, designing or building. While the schedule is flexible, you must invest about 20 hours a week including:

      • Live classes
      • Fireside chats with industry experts and mentors
      • Live Q&As with experienced developers
      • Monthly Sprint Challenges
      • Access to facilitators and mentors

[/et_pb_tab][et_pb_tab title=”Admission Requirements” _builder_version=”4.18.0″ _module_preset=”default” global_colors_info=”{}”]

The admission requirements include:

  • A willingness to learn and passion to build a career in tech.
  • Commitment to the learning journey— this should reflect in the activities and projects you’ve engaged in prior to your application.
  • A basic understanding of your preferred learning path.
  • Passing the initial assessment.
  • Availability for 6 months starting from June 2023
  • Having a laptop, steady internet connection, and a place where you can concentrate.

[/et_pb_tab][et_pb_tab title=”Admission Process” _builder_version=”4.17.0″ _module_preset=”default” global_colors_info=”{}”]

The admission process include:

  • Initial Application 
  • Payment of Application Fee
  • Success in Assessment Test
  • Payment of Program Fee
  • Signing of Enrollment Document
  • Completion of the Welcome Orientation Program
  • Training Begins

[/et_pb_tab][et_pb_tab title=”Bonus Track” _builder_version=”4.17.0″ _module_preset=”default” global_colors_info=”{}”]

Low Code Engineering: This is a very interesting and exciting add-on that we are bringing to our program! Once you have completed the training for your selected learning path, we would give you access to this training as a bonus! Low Code is the future of Software development and there is no better time to learn about it.

Leadership and Power Skills Training: This training will help develop the right mix of personal and business technical skills companies yearn for. You will be empowered to aspire to become something bigger.

[/et_pb_tab][/et_pb_tabs][/et_pb_column][/et_pb_row][et_pb_row _builder_version=”4.17.3″ _module_preset=”default” saved_tabs=”all” global_colors_info=”{}”][et_pb_column type=”4_4″ _builder_version=”4.17.3″ _module_preset=”default” global_colors_info=”{}”][et_pb_button button_url=”https://nextgen.seamfix.com/frontend-development-checkout/” button_text=”Start Application” button_alignment=”center” _builder_version=”4.17.3″ _module_preset=”default” custom_button=”on” button_text_size=”18px” button_bg_color=”#093A51″ box_shadow_style=”preset4″ box_shadow_color=”#06D665″ global_colors_info=”{}”][/et_pb_button][et_pb_text _builder_version=”4.17.3″ _module_preset=”default” text_font=”Avenir||||||||” text_text_color=”#2a2a2a” text_font_size=”20px” text_orientation=”center” global_colors_info=”{}”]

Not sure which track to select? Check out our other track options

[/et_pb_text][/et_pb_column][/et_pb_row][et_pb_row column_structure=”1_2,1_2″ _builder_version=”4.17.3″ _module_preset=”default” saved_tabs=”all” global_colors_info=”{}”][et_pb_column type=”1_2″ _builder_version=”4.17.3″ _module_preset=”default” global_colors_info=”{}”][et_pb_button button_url=”https://nextgen.seamfix.com/product-design/” button_text=”Product Design” button_alignment=”right” button_alignment_tablet=”center” button_alignment_phone=”” button_alignment_last_edited=”on|tablet” _builder_version=”4.17.3″ _module_preset=”default” custom_button=”on” button_text_size=”18px” button_bg_color=”#093A51″ box_shadow_style=”preset4″ box_shadow_color=”#06D665″ global_colors_info=”{}”][/et_pb_button][/et_pb_column][et_pb_column type=”1_2″ _builder_version=”4.17.3″ _module_preset=”default” global_colors_info=”{}”][et_pb_button button_url=”https://nextgen.seamfix.com/backend-development/” button_text=”Backend Development” button_alignment=”left” button_alignment_tablet=”center” button_alignment_phone=”” button_alignment_last_edited=”on|tablet” _builder_version=”4.17.3″ _module_preset=”default” custom_button=”on” button_text_size=”18px” button_bg_color=”#093A51″ box_shadow_style=”preset4″ box_shadow_color=”#06D665″ global_colors_info=”{}”][/et_pb_button][/et_pb_column][/et_pb_row][/et_pb_section]
